roy-description: Systems engineering student, game developer and AI enthusiast. I am a responsible person, autonomous and team worker
front-end-development-with: Front-end development with React or Vue
videogames-responsibilities: Content creation for virtual classrooms. Teaching in videogames development classes in Unity and Blender. Project Consulting
python-responsibilities: Programming tutoring. Content creation for virtual classrooms. Evaluation of students
developer-responsibilities: Game development in Unity. Augmented Reality transmedia interactive experience. C# programming. Game mechanics design. 3D modeling in Blender
intern-responsibilities: Project management (feasibility and risk analysis, design improvement, management of quotes and contractors), maintenance department support (maintenance and staff scheduling. technical drawing).
image-colorizer-description: Deep Learning project that uses two neural networks in parallel to recreate color in a black and white image. Use TensorFlow and ScikitLearn in python.
ra-nitrera-description: Serious game focused on raising awareness of water care in the municipality of Concordia Antioquia and La Nitrera nature reserve. Developed in Unity with elements of augmented reality.
gistura-description: Search engine for cultural events in the city. It has a map for easy location of events that will happen in the coming days. Frontend application built with React.
cv-robot-description: Augmented reality game in which using any green or red object you can draw and erase blocks in the world, the goal is to get the robot to reach its goal safely and sound. Built in Unity with OpenCV
